humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the sentinel lymph node (#1) has metastatic carcinoma (1/2). This indicates that the patient has metastases in at least one axillary lymph node, which corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system. The other sentinel lymph node (#2) is negative for metastatic tumor. The report also mentions that the 'N stage, pathologic: pNX' but the final N stage can be assigned as N1 based on the information provided.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is metastatic carcinoma involving one of two lymph nodes (1/2) in the right axilla, specifically in sentinel node #1. However, no extracapsular extension is identified. Based on this information, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N1.
